sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, fish sauce, brown sugar, minced garlic, minced bird's eye chili, and salt to make the dressing. 2. In a large bowl, combine julienned ripe mangoes, carrots, red bell pepper, thinly sliced red onion, chopped cilantro, and chopped mint leaves. 3. Pour dressing over the salad and toss to combine. 4. Garnish with crushed roasted peanuts. 5. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Thai Mango Salad</name> <nutrition>Calories: 250, Protein: 5g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Peel and julienne ripe mangoes and carrots. 2. Julienne red bell pepper. 3. Thinly slice red onion. 4. Chop cilantro and mint leaves. 5. Crush roasted peanuts.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:10:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c65917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afde</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
